SELECT sapc.id, u.user_name AS teacher_name, q.user_name AS admin_name, co.course_name, co.course_period, co.course_type, co.course_number, co.id AS course_id FROM apply_course sapc
LEFT JOIN `user` u ON sapc.user_teacher_id = u.id LEFT JOIN `user` q ON q.id = sapc.user_admin_id LEFT JOIN course co ON co.id = sapc.course_id LEFT JOIN stu_course stc ON stc.course_id = co.id WHERE sapc.`status`= #{status} AND co.id NOT in(SELECT s.course_id FROM stu_course s)
